name: Esendex
description:
From advanced mobile messaging like WhatsApp, RCS and mobile journeys to send in seconds SMS, Esendex helps businesses to send friction-free customer support, notifications and reminders, collections and payments, and marketing and promotions that delight.
As a frontrunner in the messaging space for over twenty years, we’ve never stood still, and continue to support over 46,000 customers to send more than 5 billion messages a year across any - or all - of their customers’ preferred channels.
 
With a quick-start platform, best-in-class API plus flexible integration options, we support one or two-way communication that feels as natural as talking to family and friends.

From global resilient routing and regulatory compliance to in-country expertise, our customers partner with us for our person-to-person support.
focus_areas: Smarter support: save time and resources, and smooth customer journeys, with automated prompts and reminders, time-sensitive messaging,  IVR
Conversational marketing: increase conversions and loyalty with messages, push notifications, order updates, delivery alerts and next-level
Frictionless commerce: provide conversational customer support at checkout, encourage purchase, support multi-factor authentication, collect
